Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute at State/24th
ShortDescription: 29 State buses are rerouted in both directions via State, Cermak, Michigan, 35th, State over regular route, due to street blockage near State/24th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, Cermak, Michigan, 35th, State, and resume regular route, due to street blockage near State/24th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Fulton
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are rerouted in both directions via Central, Washington, Austin, Lake, Central, over normal route, due to police activity near Central/Fulton

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Washington, Austin, Lake, Central, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Central/Fulton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green and Midway-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green and Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green and Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier sick customer near Roosevelt.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
